title: Ask Us Anything: Bert And Kristin Address The Tension Between Them
description:
Every week we do an "Ask Us Anything" where we answer some of your super personal questions you have for us (you can submit yours, here!).
We leave the door open for you to ask us absolutely anything - so ask away!
Up today - Kristin and Bert address the tension between them, Moe opens up about whether or not he picked up any cultural differences being a Black man on a mostly white show and Cassie goes deep on whether or not the pandemic isolation is messing up her kids.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
